column2: "Nna Jesus kasaa kyerɛɛ nyimpadodow no nye n'esuafo dɛ
column4: "Kyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo no tse Moses egua do:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi adze nyina a wɔbɛhyɛ hom no
column3: hom ndzi do
column4: na hom nyɛ: mbom mma hom nnyɛ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ bi: osiandɛ hɔn dze

column2: "Na wɔkyekyer ndzesoadze durdur a no soa yɛ yaw na wɔdze to nyimpa kɔn ho
column3: na hɔn dze
column4: wɔmmpɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn nsatseaba mpo suo mu."

column2: "Na hɔn ndwuma nyina wɔyɛ ama nyimpa eehu: wɔyɛ dza wɔkyerɛw nyamesɛm hyɛ mu bobɔ hɔn enyim no atɛtɛr
column3: na woyi hɔn ntar ano ndwow akɛse

column2: "na wɔpɛ mpanyin tsenabea wɔ edzidzi ase
column3: nye mpanyin ngua wɔ nhyiamudan mu"

column2: "nye gua do nkyiakyia
column3: na dɛ nyimpa bɛfrɛ hɔn Rabae (Kyerɛkyerɛfo)."

column2: "Na hom dze
column3: mma wɔmmfrɛ hom Rabae; na ɔbaako na ɔyɛ hom kyerɛkyerɛfo
column4: na hom nyina yɛ enuanom."

column2: "Na mma hom mmfrɛ obi hom egya wɔ asaase do: na ɔbaako nye hom Egya
column3: ɔno nye nyia ɔwɔ sor no."

column2: "Eso mma wɔmmfrɛ hom akwankyerɛfo: na ɔbaako nye hom kwankyerɛfo
column3: ɔnye Kraest no."

column2: "Na nyia ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ hom mu no
column3: ɔbɛyɛ hom somfo."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔbɛma noho do no
column3: wɔbɛbrɛ no adze
column4: na obiara a ɔbɛbrɛ noho adze no

column2: "Hom ndue! Akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo
column3: ndabrabafo! Na hom tow ɔsor ahenman mu wɔ nyimpa enyim
column4: naaso homankasa hom nnkɔ mu
column5: eso hɔn a wɔrokɔ mu no hom mma hɔn kwan mma wɔnnkɔ mu."

column2: "(Hom ndue
column3: Akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo
column4: ndabrabafo! Hom na hom bɔ ekunafo epoo
column5: na hom petuw bɔ mpaa atsentsen kyerɛ: dɛm ntsi hom benya afɔdzi kɛse.)"
column6: "#23.14 Tsetse Akyerɛwfo binom mmfa nkyekyɛmu 14 yi nnka ho."

column2: "Hom ndue
column3: Akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo
column4: ndabrabafo! Dɛ hom bɔ po ho nye asaase do aprɔw kɛyɛ nyimpa baako hom fɛkuwnyi; na sɛ ɔyɛ dɛm a
column5: hom ma ɔyɛ amandzehu kurow mu ba mbɔho ebien kyɛn homankasa."

column2: "Hom ndue! Enyifurafo akwankyerɛfo a hom se dɛ
column3: Obiara a ɔbɛka asɔrfi no ntam no nnyɛ hwee; na obiara a ɔbɛka sika a ɔwɔ asɔrfi no mu no ho ntam dze
column4: ɔda no do."

column2: "Nkwasea nye enyifurafo! No mu dza ɔwɔ hen na ɔso
column3: sika no anaa asɔrfi no a ɔtsew sika no ho no a?"

column2: "Na obiara a ɔbɛka afɔrmbukyia no ntam no
column3: ɔnnyɛ hwee; na obiara a ɔbɛka ayɛyɛdze a ɔwɔ do ho ntam no
column4: ɔda no do."

column2: "Enyifurafo! Dza ɔwɔ hen na ɔso? Ayɛyɛdze no anaa afɔrmbukyia a ɔtsew ayɛyɛdze no ho no a."
"Dɛm ntsi nyia ɔka afɔrmbukyia no ntam no
column3: ɔka ɔno nye dza ɔwɔ do no nyina."

column2: "Na nyia ɔka asɔrfi ntam no
column3: ɔka ɔno nye nyia ɔtse mu no."

column2: "Na nyia ɔka ɔsor ntam no
column3: ɔka Nyankopɔn n'ahengua nye nyia ɔtse do no."

column2: "Hom ndue
column3: Akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo
column4: ndabrabafo! Na hom yi eme nye nunum nye mprɛgowamba mpo ho ebupɛn du du ma
column5: naaso hom egyaa mbra no mu dza ɔsom bo yie no a ɔyɛ atsɛmbu
column6: ehumbɔbɔr nye gyedzi no; iyi na ɔsɛ dɛ hom yɛ
column7: ber a hom nndan nkaa no so nngya."

column2: "Enyifurafo akwankyerɛfo a hom sɔn ntonton do
column3: naaso hom men efupɔnkɔ!"

column2: "Hom ndue
column3: Akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo
column4: ndabrabafo! Hom twuw nkɔɔpow nye mprɛtse ekyir

column2: "Farisiinyi onyifurafo
column3: dzi kan twuw kɔɔpow nye prɛtse mu
column4: ama n'ekyir so eefir."

column2: "Hom ndue
column3: Akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo
column4: ndabrabafo! Na hom tse dɛ nda a wɔahoa ho
column6: na no mu dze efun mbiew ɔnye fi nyina ahyɛ ma."

column2: "Dɛmara so naaso hom yɛ dɛ nyimpa tsenenee wɔ nyimpa enyim na hom mu dze
column3: ndabraba nye emumuyɛ nyina ahyɛ ma."

column2: "Hom ndue
column3: Akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo
column4: ndabrabafo! Osiandɛ hom tow nkɔnhyɛfo nda do
column5: na hom hyehyɛ nyimpa tsenenee abodan no
column8: Sɛ yɛwɔ hɛn egyanom aber do a
column9: nkyɛ yɛnye hɔn ammbɔ mu wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo no bɔgyaa ho."

column2: "Iyi ntsi hom dzi homho dase dɛ hɔn a wokum nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn mba nye hom."
"Ntsi hom nhyɛ hom egyanom etwadze no ma."
"Hom mbowatsena
column3: nhurutsia mba! Hom bɛyɛ dɛn eguan efi amandzehu kurow atsɛmbu no mu?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hwɛ
column3: morosoma nkɔnhyɛfo nye enyansafo nye Akyerɛwfo wɔ hom hɔ
column4: na hom boku hɔn mu bi
column5: na hom abɔ hɔn mbeamudua mu; na hɔn mu bi so hom bɛka hɔn mpire wɔ hom nhyiamudan mu
column6: na hom atseetsee hɔn efi kurow mu akɔ kurow mu;"

column2: "ma bɔgya tsenenee a wɔaka egu asaase yi do nyina eegu hom do
column3: ofitsi tseneneenyi Abel bɔgyaa do kesi Barakia ba Zekaria a hom kum no wɔ asɔrdan nye afɔrmbukyia no ntamu no bɔgyaa do."

column2: "Mese hom nokwar mu dɛ
column3: Yinom nyina bɛba ɔsantsen yi do."

column2: "Ao! Jerusalɛm
column3: Jerusalɛm
column4: ɔwo a iku nkɔnhyɛfo no
column5: na isiw hɔn a wɔasoma hɔn wo nkyɛn abo
column6: mpɛn ahen na mepɛɛ dɛ moboaboa wo mba ano
column7: dɛ mbrɛ akokɔtan boaboa ne mba ano wɔ ne ntsaban ase

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: woegyaa wo fie ato hɔ pan ama hom."

column2: "Na mese hom dɛ
column3: Ofitsi sesei yi hom runnhu me ara dze akɛpem dɛ hom bɛse dɛ
column4: Nhyira nye nyia ɔnam Ewuradze ne dzin mu reba no."
